name: Gwalior Children's Hospital
description: Gwalior Children's Hospital Charity, also known as Snehalaya ('The Home with Love'), provides services including an orphanage for disabled and destitute children, a special needs school, a mainstream school for girls from villages, a health centre with mobile rural clinics, and facilities for multi-sensory, hydro, physio, and occupational therapy.

name: Gwalior Hospital and Education Charitable Trust (GHECT)
description: GHECT runs the 'Help Children of India' project, including the Snehalaya campus, which encompasses a special-needs school, a girls' school, and rural medical programs.

name: Chaudhary Charitable Hospital
description: Chaudhary Charitable Hospital offers healthcare services to the local community.
